question: Which of the following kings took up the titles of Ranavikranta, Uru-Ranavikranta, Prithivi-Vallabha and Sri-Prithivi-Vallabha?
explanation: Magalesha took up the titles of Ranavikranta, Uru-Ranavikranta, Prithivi-Vallabha and Sri-Prithivi-Vallabha. He is also described as Paramabhagavata or a devout worshipper of the Bhagavat or Vishnu.
